document_data.caption: The Green Lady and [[Sprite (creature)|sprites]] [[scry]] on the [[Vipers]] in the [[Misty Vale]].
document_data.name: "The Green Lady"
document_data.mainbody: '''"The Lady"''' or '''"The Green Lady"''' was a female [[human]] [[druid]] and follower of [[Eldath]] who lived in the [[Brynwood]] forest in [[the Vast]] in the 1350s and 1360s [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: The Lady possessed the divine [[magic]] and powers of a [[druid]], including the ability to shape-change into an animal. She used [[hallucinatory forest|illusory forests]] and [[obscurement|obscuring]] mists to defend the Misty Vale.
document_data.Description:
The Lady was an elderly woman of 80 years in 1369 DR, standing only 5 feet and 4 inches (1.6 meters) tall and quite frail. Her eyes were green but faded with age, and she had long, loose iron-grey hair. She typically wore a simple home-spun brown robe.

She was a worshiper of [[Eldath]].
document_data.Possessions: She owned a white [[oak]]en ''[[staff of the woodlands]]''.
document_data.Allies: The Lady was a close friend of the ranger Dura Gerathu. She shared the vale with a clan of sprites, who served and defended her.{{Cite dungeon/75/Into the Nest of Vipers|66}}
